body:
When scheduling a pod fails due to some unexpected error, scheduler logs are filled with huge aggregate error messages containing an error for each node causing issues for very large clusters. For example, see this truncated message that keeps appearing again and again:

```
[SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found, which is unexpected., 
SchedulerPredicates failed due to persistentvolumeclaims "mongodb" not found.........
```

This issue has been addressed by https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/47003
